description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 3 (Materials), 4 (Basement Impact Assessment), 5 (Method Statement), 6 (Landscape Scheme), 11 (Step Free Access) and 17 (Construction Logistics Plan)  of planning permission ref. 47172/APP/2023/2826, dated 21-11-2023 (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved plans) of planning permission ref 47172/APP/2022/3635 Dated 02/02/2023 'Demolition and replacement of the existing detached dwelling and garage, with a new detached two storey dwelling (including habitable roof space with 2 front and 2 rear dormers, 6 roof lights and a basement) and associated landscaping and ancillary works. Variation seeks alterations to fenestration, depth of extensions, and design of patio/external stairs.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
